html:
4.5.18  11:08 pm   it seems like you like to play around with the theme of home or lack thereof 

     i can't seem to quit doing that. perhaps i should go to re hab

4.5.18  11:07 pm   Where'd you learn this snazzy dance move? https://j.gifs.com/wmA6YX.gif

     at home, and in the work place

4.5.18  10:32 pm   i am taking some time off to myself for the first time in a long time. what do you specifically recommend i do to relax?

     become and inventor, and do some inventing

4.5.18  10:08 pm   Hey Bill, I've been trying to figure out the chords - especially the theory - behind the cadence this guy plays in 03:17. Could you help explain how he moves from one chord to another? Thank you.
https://youtu.be/d9gdGvnW9DM

     it's just coming down through C minor stuff, except landing on Dbmaj7 at the end

4.5.18  9:44 pm   have you ever considered becoming a farmer

     no

4.5.18  9:13 pm   12.25.17  2:44 am - I don't buy it. No way this isn't about a person. "I always feel for you", "I always dream of you". What's the story here?

     i wrote a song about going to new canaan, on the way to new canaan

4.5.18  8:13 pm   i need to have a conversation about something important with myself (you can probably relate to this need) but i'm not sure how to go about it. my housemates area always home, and i don't feel comfortable talking honestly with them listening. and i know i need to talk it out to come to a conclusion, or at least wrap up my thoughts.
what can i do to blend in while pretending to talk on the phone? i don't have a car, and public transport is practically nonexistent in my area

     type it in a text file on your computer?

4.5.18  7:24 pm   Can you help me with the chords for the chorus for this tune? I think what I'm playing works over the song, but the piano's kind of in the background and I might be off... So.. I think it's Bmaj7, Bdim7, Ebm11, Dbm7, then Gb9?? (Here is the link https://youtu.be/HGNb5yh7RkE chorus comes in at around 33 seconds) 

     you're gonna want Bb+7 for your second chord (Bbaug7). Bb in the bass, D, Gb, Ab in the chord

4.5.18  7:18 pm   when will you finally finish your next album?

     i think i prefer to release songs individually

     because in one of your songs you said you were working on a album. 

     i didn't say that, it was lyrics to a song i wrote

4.5.18  7:06 pm   how do you feel about homework?

     each homework has a slightly different flavour

4.5.18  5:45 pm   hi how do i know what to fear and what to embrace thanks a lot 

     just fear and embrace everything

4.5.18  5:39 pm   anagram for bill wurtz:      incompetent fuck

     fair enough

4.5.18  4:57 pm   music is just so darn sexy that it's almost unfair and then throw in a visual and holy cheese it's like a magical spell how do you keep such good morals??

     check out some music videos about morals

4.5.18  4:12 pm   I think I'm not a human

     ah, #relatable

4.5.18  3:03 pm   Given the choice between pickles and feeding every human for the next 12 years, what type of pickle would you choose?

     none

4.5.18  2:40 pm   when will i hear you on the radio?

     as soon as possible

4.5.18  2:21 pm   do you no of any good music retailers for musical items??

     i like the ones that ask me what my phone number is, so we can enjoy many good conversations later

4.5.18  2:04 pm   what's the best chair to give inspirational speeches on?

     very large

4.5.18  1:49 pm   opinion on prime numbers?

     they are very independent

4.5.18  1:16 pm   help i can't stop stopping

     how did you start

4.5.18  1:09 pm   i just ate a broom 

     that makes sense

4.5.18  10:41 am   so you answer questions



but do you question answers?

     yes

4.5.18  10:37 am   what flavor of food is the best

     mud

4.5.18  9:01 am   Is it plagiarism if it's an accident?

     ah, that's what's known in the business as accidental plagiarism

4.5.18  8:42 am   how do i overcome my fear of ducks?

     spend some more time with them

4.5.18  8:29 am   if i can only make music on a computer and can't play any instruments can i even call myself a musician

     if you only write books on a computer keyboard, are you still a writer

4.5.18  8:19 am   I find  your lyrics style  somewhat similar to Roger Waters', but yours are more relaxed. Why do you think I think that?

     i have no idea. i thought roger waters was a member of pink floyd, which if i recall correctly is one of the most relaxed bands in the universe

4.5.18  8:11 am   How do I know that things other than my own mind actually exist?

     how will they know you exist

4.5.18  3:03 am   How did you get into music?

     i don't remember

4.5.18  3:00 am   What chord makes you go ooooh, what chord makes you go uhhhh, and what chord makes you crave a pan pizza?

     it all depends how and when it is played

4.5.18  1:36 am   Do you get a lot of questions that you can tell are trying to be funny but the joke falls flat?

     all jokes are flat. some days the entire earth is flat

4.5.18  1:31 am   Why don't you capitalize the I in "I"?

     5.26.16  4:51 pm

4.5.18  12:35 am   Non-human computers can write music, and a lot of it sounds very a-human-made-this-ish.

     that's fine, you can use that if you prefer

      Your thoughts on the matter?

     it's not good enough for my purposes

4.5.18  12:09 am   least favorite opening poker hand?

     pocket nothing

4.4.18  10:45 pm   Do you think iPods can become popular again

     personally i prefer off line players. doesn't have to be that brand necessarily. just a thing to listen to music that does not try to also sell me music at the same time

4.4.18  10:40 pm   are there more real things or fake things

     most things are a delicate blend

4.4.18  9:43 pm   What is the point to the "reality" section of your website?

     to maybe have people hear some of the things i have said to myself

4.4.18  8:57 pm   What is the Alphabet Song about?

     the alphabet?

4.4.18  8:31 pm   i think i'm a human

     ah, #relatable

4.4.18  7:35 pm   mountain or sea?

     how bout a medium grade ocean foam, everywhere

4.4.18  6:24 pm   I noticed you've been asked about what program you use for your speech-harmonization vids... I know you do it all yourself, but I'm curious... is there even such a thing as an auto-harmonization program? I've never heard of that.

     sure, but it does a very different thing than what i'm doing there

      I have tones on my keyboard that automatically add a 5th on top of each note, and I know there's octave pedals and stuff like that.. but I've never heard of a program that generates chords for a melody. Is that a real thing?

     sure, but if you give it raw key-free speech, the results are not liable to sound particularly humane. even with the strongest computer-minds alive

     If so, seems like it would take a lot of the fun out of writing music. 

     don't worry, according to my calculations, computers won't be able to do our secret human tricks until they are at least fully human

4.4.18  5:58 pm   what is one of the foods you have eaten recently 

     bat shit

     are you sure

4.4.18  5:04 pm   are these answers real

     yes

      or do you write them yourself

     yes

4.4.18  4:58 pm   do you rate people's worth based on how many toes they have?

     no

4.4.18  4:46 pm   3.31.18  11:31 pm This asker called the half/whole step key change at the end "cliche". It is used often, but do you think it's cliche or just so good that it works well for many songs?

     it doesn't matter to me, i'll do it if it works or skip it if it doesn't

4.4.18  4:31 pm   whats a good way to improvise on a C7 | Bb7 vamp?
i experimented with the Bb major pentatonic because it would basically work on both chords.
going from one mixolydian scale to the other sounded very obvious... how can i play a cool line wirhout implementing  the harmonic movement so strong? 

     just play in C mixo, no 6, and see what develops. see what concessions you need to make on that second chord. hint, Ab's will be more available on the second chord. or a better strategy is just make every note available all the time and if you play it for long enough you should handily learn which ones not to play when

4.4.18  4:17 pm   What's the difference between nowhere and always

     nothing

4.4.18  4:07 pm   when you say a project that takes more than a week is unacceptable what consequence is there?

     time passes, without it being done

      people are constantly going to ask about the new thing no matter how soon you finish. please don't be mad at yourself, you are fucking awesome
